name: Giant Ape
description: The Giant Ape is an enormous primate, towering like a small building with massive arms capable of uprooting trees and smashing through rock. It is intelligent enough to use simple tools or weapons and can become a fearsome opponent when threatened.
memorable: Its ability to hurl boulders and easily grapple foes makes it a terrifying creature to confront in battle.
goals: Typically rules its territory in remote jungles or mountains, using its strength to dominate the environment.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other large beasts or in territory that includes plants and terrain it manipulates.
strengths: Exceptional physical power and grappling abilities, making it difficult for opponents to escape once caught.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class of 12, which leaves it vulnerable to attacks.
attacks: Can strike with massive fists in melee combat or throw large rocks at distant foes.
most_powerful_ability: Multiattack allows it to strike twice in a single turn, increasing its combat effectiveness.
senses: Passive Perception of 14 grants it good awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Strong in athletics with a +9 modifier, showcasing its physical prowess and ability to grapple.
additional_information: Can throw grappled creatures, causing them additional damage.
Low intelligence and charisma scores make it ineffective in social situations.
Possesses high strength, allowing for devastating melee attacks.
Intelligent enough to use simple tools.
Can deal substantial damage with both melee and ranged attacks.
test_queries: massive jungle beast with powerful punches
ferocious ape that dominates its territory
huge beast with devastating melee attacks
